headline: Apollo exploring sale of Cox Media broadcast TV stations, Bloomberg News reports
summary: Private equity firm Apollo islooking to sell Cox Media Group for nearly $4 billion, BloombergNews reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter. ...
